definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: I lifted my right hand and made scissoring movements with my first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我擡起右手，用食指和中指做了幾個剪東西的動作。

sentences.english: Use the thumbs and forefingers to guide the floss between the teeth.
sentences.chinese: 握緊牙線，用食指和拇指輕柔地在牙縫間操作牙線。

sentences.english: Then poke additional holes, index finger joints extended, not hyperextended.
sentences.chinese: 食指關節要伸展，但不要過度伸展。

sentences.english: He ran his forefinger around the lip of the jug, then put the finger in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他用食指在酒壺嘴兒上一抹，再把這指頭放進嘴裏。

sentences.english: Grasp chart with thump and forefinger and pull straight up.
sentences.chinese: 用拇指和食指緊握原表，在垂直向上拉。

sentences.english: Vs with their thumbs and forefingers, measuring angles.
sentences.chinese: 鳥類學家們用大拇指和食指構成v形量測角度。

sentences.english: The food is listed under the fingertips missing points .
sentences.chinese: 而食指尖下就是列缺穴天津按摩。

sentences.english: He hushed me with his index finger against his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他把食指貼在嘴上告訴我別做聲。

sentences.english: He tightened his grasp upon my hand, and raised a forefinger threateningly before my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他握緊我的手，伸出一根食指在我們眼前威脅地晃動。

sentences.english: Zhu then lifted his right hand and made scissoring movements with his first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 朱軍這時舉起右手，用食指和中指做出剪東西的動作。

sentences.english: The refreshment after the operation that the tendon of ring finger and forefinger ruptures problem?
sentences.chinese: 無名指和食指的肌腱斷裂的手術後的恢復問題？

sentences.english: An index finger is used to identify the utero-ovarian ligament and aid in clamp placement.
sentences.chinese: 以食指鑑別並協助鉗夾卵巢固有韌帶。

sentences.english: Use your forefingers to press the dents under the heads of your eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 用食指按額頭下部，眉毛下處凹的地方。

sentences.english: The next step was pecking out stories.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是把故事用食指在打字機上慢慢地打出來。

sentences.english: His index finger steadied on my suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 他的食指最後指向我的行李箱停止不動了。

sentences.english: The old man tapped the steering wheel once with his foreFingers.
sentences.chinese: 那位老爺子用食指輕輕拍着方向盤。

definition: to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
the five fingers of one's hand
